Class AdWordsSessionUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Helper class to copy the AdWordsSession.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • copy

                                  String userAgent)

        userAgent - the new User Agent for the session

      • fromFileWithOAuth2

        public static AdWordsSession fromFileWithOAuth2()
                                         throws OAuthException,
                                                ValidationException,
                                                com.google.api.ads.common.lib.conf.ConfigurationLoadException
        Creates a new AdWordsSession using the ads.properties file and using OAuth2.
        Returns:
        the AdWordsSession associated with the ads.properties file
        Throws:
        OAuthException - if problem with OAuth2
        com.google.api.ads.common.lib.conf.ConfigurationLoadException - if problems loading the ad.properties file
        ValidationException - if the AdWordsSession did not validate
